item.title: Debian+Apache+Tomcat+Axis
item.description: Hello, one of the courses I’m following at the university is “Laboratorio di reti di calcolatori” which uses the technologies (really technologies?????) listed in the post title. This is a little tutorial for making them works, with a little script for registering .wsdd files. - aptitude install apache2 tomcat6 - download the binaries of axis 1.x (latest is 2.x, it’s not used in our course) and xerces then unpack them.
